### Carleton Martello Tower Conservation Project - Phase 2

#### Contract Information
* **Contract Title**: Carleton Martello Tower Conservation Project - Phase 2
* **Reference Number**: WS4025489442-Doc4025742030
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4025489442
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Project Overview
Public Services and Procurement Canada (SPAC) invites qualified contractors to bid on the Carleton Martello Tower Conservation Project - Phase 2, located in Saint John, New Brunswick.

#### Work Description
The contract includes the following services:

* Mobilization
* Design and installation of heated, enclosed scaffolding
* Shoring of the tower throughout the work period
* Protection of existing elements
* Demolition of the existing concrete Command Post
* Structural masonry repairs to the existing Martello Tower
* Construction of a replacement Command Post
* Repairs to the interior brick vault and related masonry work
* Cleaning of masonry
* Reinstatement of existing landscaping
* De-mobilization

#### Tender Information
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 6, 2023 at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: N/A
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Method of Procurement**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

Note: This passage is merely an invitation to qualify. Please refer to the official tender notice for complete information on the procurement.
